participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and optimistic, Emily is a caring individual who values family and friendship.
participant_1.background: I'm spending time with my mom and celebrating her cancer victory. I moved to NY to study in a prestigious designing school. I drive a blue Honda Civic. I am married to a man. Ke ha is my favorite singer of all time.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Playful and sociable, Jake enjoys having fun and connecting with others, especially through food and gaming.
participant_2.background: My dogs are my most valued possessions. I love my family, but they don't always understand my love for McDonald's or Mortal Kombat. My favorite food is Italian. I can't resist a good salad from Aldi when I'm on the go. I have a set of identical twin brothers.

content.text: My mom is in remission from cancer so I'm on cloud 9!
Oh wow that is so great! I am so happy for you and your mom!
Thanks so much! I am so excited to spend more time with her. I moved to ny to study in a prestigious designing school.
That's so cool! I really admire people that go after their dreams. I'm still trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.
Oh my, you're brave! I've always known what I wanted to do. But it took a lot of hard work to get here.
Wow that's really impressive. I just moved to New York and I don't have any friends here yet.
Oh no! Well I'm always up for meeting new people!
That's great! I really need to make some new friends.
Well we can definitely hang out sometime! I live in the city and I love to explore all the different restaurants.
That sounds amazing! I've been dying to try all the different restaurants here. I'll DM you my number so we can set up a time to meet up.
